name: A Tale of Elda and Ink (Zelda Inpsired)
name_original: A Tale of Elda and Ink (Zelda Inpsired)
description:
Two games mashed together, Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons and The Legend of Zelda.
Control Elda and Ink with one controller going through dungeons solving puzzles.

This game is part of a YouTube video series where I mash two games together and show the process of making it.

Controls
Pause: Start Button

Elda
Move: Left Thumbstick 
Block: Left Trigger
Attack: Left Shoulder Button

Ink
Move: Right Thumbstick
Block: Right Trigger
Attack: Right Shoulder Button

Known Bugs

  • Skeleton enemy doesn't attack sometimes.
